data.content:
Tính từ
xun xoe, bợ đỡ, nịnh hót

verb
fawns; fawned; fawning
[no obj] disapproving :to try to get the approval of an important or powerful person by giving that person praise, special attention, etc.
a sports star surrounded by fawning fans
usually + over or on
The waiters were fawning (all) over the celebrity.
She doesn't seem to mind being fawned on by her fans.
noun
plural fawns
[count] :a young deer especially; :a deer that is less than a year old
[noncount] :a light brown color :tan
